feature1.explanation: Both texts show consistent use of hyphens and commas to separate clauses and phrases.

feature2.explanation: Similar lexical choices and grammatical structures are observed in both texts, indicating a common writing style.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures and lengths are comparable in complexity and coherence.

feature4.explanation: Both texts share a similar tone and mood, focusing on a critical analysis without emotional language.

feature5.explanation: There are no apparent spelling or typographical errors in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderate to high.
